ManualCheck.Description: Column where users mark groups to manually check

Notes.Description: Column to mark notes about the param group

RenameKeyGroup.Description: Auto-generated suggested rename of Non-Domiannt Groups based on variant scanning parameters

Counts.Description: Number of Files in the Parameter Group

MergeInto.Description: Column to mark groups to remove with a '0'

KeyGroupCount.Description: Number of participants in a Key Group

KeyGroup.Description: A set of scans whose filenames share all BIDS filename key-value pairs, excluding subject and session

ParamGroup.Description: The set of scans with identical metadata parameters in their sidecars (defined within a Key Group and denoted numerically)

KeyParamGroup.Description: Key Group name and Param Group number separated by a double underscore
